channel.title: Necromancer's Revenge necromancer and vengeful spirit wins!
channel.description:
[color=grey]Necromancer's Revenge[/color] -
[color=grey]The host are @Firekitten and @PoisonedSquid[/color]-
[color=grey]Flavor[/COLOR] One day people of adiart were enjoying their life in the castle, The BD were doing BD things, the unseen were brutally murdering people, and the cult were sacrificing to mithras, good things. But suddenly all has changed when someone died....
As someone was brutally stabbed by the unseen, the assassin saw something. Saw the ghost of the BD. He appeared out of nowhere and the assassin ran, knowing that the BD ghost was somehow going to try to stop him. He told his mastermind and then they started planning.
The cult was causally killing someone for mithras when it didn't work, The ghost appeared there, and the cult knew mithras wasn't going to be pleased. They knew they had to find a way to figure out what was happening.
Soon everyone knew and chaos erupted, but the king knew, that this was the work of the necromancer.
[color=grey]Mechanics[/color] You know when you die, and you are like. Man that sucks. I wish I could affect the game somehow....FEAR NOT. We have the solution to your problems.. When you die you get a one shot ability. The ability has to be used the night after you died. The dead abilities are the following
[COLOR=grey]New Classes[/color] To balance this I had to add a couple of new classes. They are
[details="New Classes"] >[color=steblue]The Saint [/color] >- >Passive-You are immune to death once. Day Ability-Force a dead person to use their ability on a person of your choice-1 use Night Ability 1-Give a dead person a extra use of their ability-Infinite uses 1 day cooldown. Night Abiliy 2-Take away a persons dead ability-1 use Converts into-**[color=purple]The Exorcist[/COLOR]**
>[color=purple]The Exorcist[/color] >- >Passive-You are immune to death once. Day Ability-Force a dead person to use their ability on a person of your choice-Unlimited Uses 2 day cooldown. Night Ability 1-Give a dead person a extra use of their ability-Infinite uses 1 day cooldown Night Abiliy 2-Take away a persons dead ability-Unlimited Uses-1 day cooldown.
>[color=grey]The Necromancer (Neutral Killing)[/color] >- >Passive-Immune to death. Immune to poison. Immune to occupation/redirection. Day Ability-Rise-Use a dead players ability (They shall not lose a charge)-Unlimited Uses. Day Ability 2-Powerful Ghost-Make your attack bypass night immunity tonight-3 uses (1 day cooldown) Night Ability 1-Spooky Ghost-Kill a person using a ghost. (No you aren't actually using a ghost. You just aren't seen visiting the person and you won't die to a knight but a knight will block it and not die)-Unlimited Uses
>[color=grey]Vengeful Spirit[/color] >- >Passive-Undying-If you die you can still use your abilties, but you will have a cooldown of +1 days on all your abilties. You keep the same amount of uses you had before you died. Day Ability 1-Spooky-Use a dead players ability (They shall not lose a charge)-3 uses. Night Ability 1-Magic Swap-Swap two people, all DEAD players targeting X will target Y and vice versa. Night Ability 2-Magical Cloak-Take away a use of a dead person's ability-1 use Win condition: Have BD lose at any cost, even at the cost of your own life. [/details]
[details="Dead BD abilities"] [color=aqua]The Butler[/color]-Occupy anyone visiting target.
[color=aqua]The Court Wizard[/color]-Swap two people.
[color=aqua]The Drunk[/color]-Make a player not be able to use their day ability tomorrow.
[color=aqua]The Good King[/color]-Debt someone (Stays until it's used)
[color=aqua]The Hunter[/color]-Wolf someone
[color=aqua]The Knight[/color]-Prevent all visits to a person.
[color=aqua]The Maid[/color]-Check a players for royal blood. Give the results to a player of your choice. These can be messed with. If a player is a prince/saint or a sheriff they shall not recieve the results.
[color=aqua]The Mystic[/color]-Send a message to the living.
[color=aqua]The Noble[/color]-Give player X2 votes toMORROW
[color=aqua]The Observer[/color]-See who your target visits tonight. You shall give the results to a player of your choice. If you target a prince/saint or a sheriff they shall not recieve the results.
[color=aqua]The Physician[/color]-Heal someone of bleeding.
[color=aqua]The Prince[/color]-Jail someone.
[color=aqua]The Princess[/color]-See if X attacked someone. Give the results to a player of your choice. This can be messed with. If you target a prince/saint or a sheriff they shall not recieve the results.
[color=aqua]The Sheriff[/color]-See if the unseen visited X at all. Give the results to a player of your choice. if they are a prince/saint they shall not recieve the results.
[color=aqua]The Squire[/color]-Use any BD dead ability. [/details]
[details="Dead Unseen abilities"]
[color=purple]The Servant[/color]-Occupy everyone visiting target
[color=purple]The Sage[/color]-Swap two players.
[color=purple]The Alcoholic[/color]-Disable a players day ability tomorrow.
[color=purple]The Evil King[/color]-Frame a person for the rest of the game.
[color=purple]The Poacher[/color]-Spiketrap-
[color=purple]The Enforcer[/color]-Block all visits to target unseen tonight.
[color=purple]The Handmaiden[/color]-Matchmake two players but occupy them both (The unseen shall recieve the results)
[color=purple]The Illusionist[/color]-Frame a player tonight.
[color=purple]The Aristocrat[/color][/color]-Take away someone's vote tomorrow.
[color=purple]The Nightwatch[/color]-Learn target's class type and faction (Your faction shall recieve the results)
[color=purple]The Herbalist[/color]-Defile a player, If they are lynched tomorrow they shall appear as X. You can replace their logs. (X is what class you want them to appear as)
[color=purple]The Duchess[/color]-Make a target unseen of your choice appear NS tonight.
[color=purple]The Page[/color]-Use any unseen dead ability of your choice.
[color=purple]The Assassin[/color]-Nightshade a player.
[color=purple]The Mastermind[/color]-Find out if a player is convertible and what they will turn into and give it to the unseen.
[color=purple]The Sellsword[/color]-Empower the assassin tonight. They will be occupy immune and redirect immune [/details]
[color=grey]Changes[/color] Priest shall not spawn. The necromancer will always spawn as the NK. One of the neutrals shall always be the vengeful spirit. You must use the ability the night you die or you won't ever be able to use it unless someone gives you an use. [color=grey]Normal rules apply[/color] 1.Insert memes and normal rules.
[color=grey]Rolelist[/color]
King Prince Sheriff Saint Necromancer Vengeful Spirit Assassin Mastermind Random BD Random BD Random BD Random BD Random BD Random BD Random BD/Neutral Random BD/Neutral
[color=grey]Sign Ups[/color] 1.Livicus-Died Mod Error-The Butler 2.Luxy-The Sheriff 3.Celeste-The Saint 4.Max-Lynched D5-Assassin 5.Solic-Necromancer 6.Hjask-Butler 7.Boss-Died N5-Assassin 8.Baz-Lynched D3-The Court Wizard 9.Htm-Died N5-Prince 10.Shurian-Died N1-Princess 11.Captain-Sam-Died N5-Mastermind 12.Blizer-Dead N2-Assassin 13.Marl-Dead N2-Squire 14.Math-Died N1-Physician 15.Gamer-The Good King 16.Tech-Dead N2-Vengeful Spirit
Back Ups 1.Noz 2.Livicus
